src:
Borneo FC Sambut Kepulangan Diego Michiels
03 Nov 2019, 15:46 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Borneo FC menyambut kedatangan pemain andalannya, Diego Michiels. Diego yang mengalami cedera cukup lama akhirnya kembali ke klub. Sebelumnya, ia menjalani pemulihan cedera di Jakarta.
Fisioterapis Borneo FC, Wanda Prasetyo, mengatakan kendati sudah bergabung bersama rekan-rekannya, tapi pemain yang bermain di posisi bek ini belum bisa membela tim dalam waktu dekat. Menurut dia, Diego harus menjalani perawatan tambahan lagi.
“Belum bisa bertanding. Harus rehabilitasi untuk memastikan kondisi Diego seutuhnya,” kata Wanda, Minggu, 3 November 2019. Ia memprediksi Diego memerlukan waktu untuk meningkatkan stamina sekitar dua pekan. Bila semua berjalan lancar, mantan pemain Mitra Kukar ini sudah bisa tampil saat Borneo FC melawan PSS Sleman pada Rabu, 20 November 2019.
Diego mengalami cedera saat Borneo bertemu Persib Bandung. Di laga itu ia kaki Diego tersandung rumput dan tak sengaja terinjak lawan. Cedera yang dideritanya harus membuat kapten Pesut Etam ini harus absen lama dalam pertandingan Liga 1 2019.
Diego dirawat di Klinik Fisioterapi Esa Unggul Jakarta selama satu bulan lebih. Selama ia dalam masa perawatan, posisinya digantikan Makarius Suruan.
Walau absen cukup lama tanpa pemain berusia 29 tahun ini, Borneo bisa tampil stabil. Kini, mereka ada di peringkat keempat klasemen Liga 1 dengan mengemas 41 poin.

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
Borneo FC Welcomes Diego Michiels' Return
03 Nov 2019, 15:46 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Borneo FC welcomed the arrival of its flagship player, Diego Michiels. Diego, who suffered a long injury, finally returned to the club. Previously, he underwent injury recovery in Jakarta.
Borneo FC Physiotherapist, Wanda Prasetyo, said that although he had joined with his colleagues, but the player who played in the position of defender has not been able to defend the team in the near future. According to him, Diego must undergo additional treatment again.
"You can't compete yet. It must be rehabilitated to ensure Diego's condition is complete, "said Wanda, Sunday, November 3, 2019. He predicts Diego needs time to increase stamina around two weeks. If all goes well, the former Mitra Kukar player will be able to perform during Borneo FC against PSS Sleman on Wednesday, November 20, 2019.
Diego suffered an injury when Borneo met Persib Bandung. In that fight he stumbled on Diego's feet and accidentally stepped on the opponent. The injury he suffered had to make the captain of Pesut Etam have to miss a long time in the 2019 League 1 match.
Diego was treated at the Jakarta Esa Superior Physiotherapy Clinic for over a month. During his stay in care, his position was replaced by Makarius Suruan.
Although absent for a long time without this 29-year-old player, Borneo can appear stable. Now, they are ranked fourth in the League 1 standings by packing 41 points.

INDONESIA LIGA
